text:
- [Narrator] Building ML
models, isn't only difficult,
it's time consuming.

Not to mention the amount of
deep knowledge and expertise

that's required to identify
the best models for your data.
With Amazon SageMaker Autopilot
you can eliminate the heavy lifting
of building ML models.
Build, train and tune the best ML models
based on your data,

all while having full
control and visibility
into the outputs.
You just provide a tabular data set,
and select the target column to predict.
SageMaker Autopilot fills in missing data,
provides statistical insights
about columns in your data set,

and extracts information
from non-numeric columns.

And SageMaker Autopilot can
also automatically detect

the problem type, such as
classification or regression
based on your data.
Explore high-performing algorithms,
and train and optimize hundreds of models
to find the one that best fits your needs.
Models are automatically generated.
You can view the list of models,

and deploy the one that is
best suited in your use case.

You can easily understand
and explain how models

created with SageMaker
Autopilot make predictions,

and you can even access an
Amazon SageMaker Studio Notebook
for any model.

That means you can view
details, refine, and recreate
at any time.
(upbeat instrumental music)

Get started with Amazon
SageMaker Autopilot,
and automatically create
high-quality machine learning models.
